page.title: 20GREEN LANES IN LAMERTON-2
page.content: Our green lane is no longer used as a road.The farmer who owns the surrounding land uses the lane with his tractor,and sometimes drives his animals along it to his fields.As well as this the lane is used by walkers and as a bridle-path.We wondered if this lane was part of an old road leading to Tavistock,since it runs parallel to the present road for part of it's length. We have not found evidence of this, but it seems likely.The farm machinery we found was of the horse drawn type so this indicates that the lane has been undisturbed for many years.
